info.title: kenzie-kars-api
info.description: The Kenzie Kars API is the backend for the Kenzie Kars application. It has been developed using Node.js, Express, TypeORM, and PostgreSQL. This API provides a set of endpoints that allow you to perform various operations related to the Kenzie Kars application.

post.description: This route is responsible for creating a new user. The fields "name", "email", "password", "cpf", "phone", "birthdate", and "address" are required, while the "description" and "isSeller" fields are optional. Any additional fields sent will be ignored. Creating a user with an existing email is not possible. The password must contain a minimum of 6 characters, including at least one letter and one digit. The "address" field should include the following properties: "cep", "state", "city", "street", "number", while the "complement" field is optional.

example.name: Eduardo Schwert

password: Password must have at least 6 characters

409.description: Conflict - Attempt to create a user with an email that is already registered

get.description: This route is responsible for retrieving a user's profile based on their token.

401.description: Unauthorized - No authorization token provided, the provided token has expired, or the token is invalid.

put.description: This route is responsible for updating a user's data based on their token. The fields "name", "email", "password", "cpf", "phone", and "birthdate" are required, while the "description" field is optional. Any additional fields sent will be ignored. Updating a user with an existing email is not possible. The password must contain a minimum of 6 characters, including at least one letter and one digit.

401.description: Unauthorized - No authorization token provided, the provided token has expired, or the token is invalid.

409.description: Conflict - Attempt to update a user with an email that is already registered

400.description: Bad Request - Some fields are in an invalid format. Please ensure that all fields are provided correctly.

password: Password must have at least 6 characters
Password must contain at least one letter and one number

delete.description: This route is responsible for deleting a user based on their token.

401.description: Unauthorized - No authorization token provided, the provided token has expired, or the token is invalid.

put.description: This route is responsible for updating a user's address data based on their token. The fields "cep", "state", "city", "street", and "number" are required, while the "complement" field is optional. Any additional fields sent will be ignored.

401.description: Unauthorized - No authorization token provided, the provided token has expired, or the token is invalid.

400.description: Bad Request - Some fields are in an invalid format. Please ensure that all fields are provided correctly.

post.description: This route is responsible for sending an email containing a link with a token to recover a user's password. The "email" field is mandatory.

404.description: Not Found - The specified user email does not exist.

400.description: Bad Request - Some required fields were not sent or are in an invalid format. Please ensure all mandatory fields are provided correctly.

value.message: Error sending email, please check your email and try again

post.description: This route is responsible for recovering a user's password. The "password" field is required. It also verifies if the token is valid and has not expired.

404.description: Not Found - The provided token does not correspond to any user.

400.description: Bad Request - Some required fields were not sent or are in an invalid format. Please ensure all mandatory fields are provided correctly.

password: Password must have at least 6 characters
Password must contain at least one letter and one number

get.description: This route is responsible for retrieving all vehicles.
This route is responsible for retrieving vehicles belonging to a specific user.

404.description: Not Found - The specified seller ID does not exist.

get.description: This route is responsible for retrieving an active vehicle.

404.description: Not Found - The specified vehicle ID does not exist.

post.description: This route is responsible for creating a new vehicle. The "brand", "model", "year", "fuel", "mileage", "color", "price", and "coverImage" fields are required, while the "description" field is optional. Additionally, an optional array of images can be provided, with a maximum of 6 images. Any additional fields sent will be ignored.

401.description: Unauthorized - No authorization token provided, the provided token has expired, or the token is invalid.

403.description: Forbidden - You don't have permissions to perform this action

400.description: Bad Request - Some required fields were not sent or are in an invalid format. Please ensure all mandatory fields are provided correctly.

value.message: The specified car model is not available in the internal car database.

get.description: This route is responsible for retrieving a user's vehicles based on their token.

put.description: This route is responsible for updating a vehicle. The "brand", "model", "year", "fuel", "mileage", "color", "price", and "coverImage" fields are required, while the "description" field is optional. Additionally, an optional array of images can be provided, with a maximum of 6 images. Any additional fields sent will be ignored.

parameters.name: vehicleId
parameters.description: ID of the vehicle to update

post.description: This route is responsible for logging in a registered user. The "email" and "password" fields are mandatory, and any additional fields sent will be ignored. Upon successful login, an access token called "token" will be returned, which should be included in requests to routes that require authorization.

400.description: Bad Request - Some required fields were not sent or are in an invalid format. Please ensure all mandatory fields are provided correctly.

401.description: Unauthorized - The email or password is wrong.
